author: ottalabotta
content:
Hey everyone

I’m a co-founder of https://twitter.com/zkpservices, we’re building a plug-and-play ZK service for any EVM compatible chain or web2 database provider (think google cloud, aws, etc.) 

Looking to connect with anyone in Web3 really, but if you have a particular interest in ZK or if you're a dev that might want to test out our platform, please do reach out :)!
